title: Ride with The Radavist Team in Tucson, AZ this Sunday!
content:
Hi friends! John, Cari, Josh, Spencer, and Travis will be in Tucson this weekend and would be stoked if you came out to ride with us on Sunday afternoon!

We’ll meet at Tucson Hop Shop at 3:00pm on Sunday 12/3 and depart from there. The route will be “Two Tunnels,” which is a chill mixed-surface 10-mile ride in the Catalina Foothills. It’s getting dark early these days, so bring lights!

Hope to see you there!

The post Ride with The Radavist Team in Tucson, AZ this Sunday! appeared first on The Radavist.
author: Josh Weinberg
